title: Life in Tatters
description: Rose Hall is a werewolf who has recently moved down from her hometown in Alaska to Washington D.C. and is working at a modern/old-fashioned (don't ask how that's possible, it just is!) bookstore. Then, when her boss is unexpectedly murdered, Rose is dragged even deeper into the enigmatic place of vampires, death, and annoyingly, ruggedly handsome, Alpha werewolves.
author: Emilia Ros√©n
